EmailTemplate.subject: Validation Report through CRM Record

Your plant is implemented! Please review the Deployment Validation Report for details from our data validation checks. Link to report :
{!CRM_Project__c.Name}

Please note this is an automated email. If you have any questions or concerns please contact your Technical Project Manager.
